SELECT notice.id , notice.deleted , notice.created_at as createdAt , notice.modified_at as modifiedAt
, notice.title , notice.content , notice.img FROM notice WHERE notice.id = #{id}
mapper.sql: WHERE notice.id is not NULL AND notice.deleted = #{deleted} AND notice.created_at >= CONCAT(#{sdate}, ' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#{fdate}, ' 23:59:59') >= notice.created_at AND notice.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
mapper.select: SELECT count(notice.id) as listsize FROM notice

SELECT notice.id FROM notice
ORDER BY notice.id ORDER BY notice.title DESC ASC LIMIT #{offset}, #{perpage}

SELECT notice.id FROM notice
AND #{cursor} > notice.id ORDER BY notice.id DESC
AND notice.id > #{cursor} ORDER BY notice.id ASC
AND #{mark} > CONCAT(notice.title, '_', notice.id) ORDER BY notice.title DESC
AND CONCAT(notice.title, '_', notice.id) > #{mark} ORDER BY notice.title ASC
LIMIT 0, #{perpage}
